QuestData.Title: Bigger Fish to Fry
QuestData.Description: I've prepared a team of bright young Pearlfin trainees who need field experience.$B$BTake them northeast, into the Bamboo Wilds, and kill any wildlife that you find.$B$BDon't bring them back until they're fit for battle.
QuestData.LogDescription: Train the Pearlfin Adepts by killing 24 wildlife in the Bamboo Wilds.
QuestData.RewardText: Your trainees returned recently. I could hardly believe my eyes! They did not look like the same jinyu that you left with.$B$BExcellent work, $c. Couldn't have done better myself.
